item.title: Fantasy Football 18
item.description: Fantasy Football 2018 Season Fantasy Football statistics is getting an upgrade in 2019! I was finally able to get my library functional for analyzing the ESPN Fantasy leagues after ESPN started to overhaul their API at the end of 2018. Summary of 2018 2018 was another great FF season as the League saw it’s second two time winner, David H, blow everyone away in the regular season with exceptional drafting.
